Outlier Detection in Python

This document discusses various methods for outlier detection in Python, including simple and machine learning-based approaches. Outliers are data points that are significantly different from the entire dataset, and their presence can skew analytics and training time. The document covers simple methods such as sorting and more advanced techniques like Robust Covariance, One-Class SVM, Isolation Forest, and Local Outlier Factor.

outlier detection machine learning anomaly detection fraud detection
